open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

closed.title: FrogFoot Outage | Queenswood & Villieria
closed.description: FrogFoot has informed us of a network outage affecting Queenswood, Villieria and surrounding areas, affected clients will experience no connectivity. FrogFoot engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: Frogfoot technicians has located the damaged cable and is trying to reroute the fibre on another link to restore services.
Frogfoot technicians are done with repairs however some links remain down. Frogfoot technicians are at the node testing to locate the fibre break.
Frogfoot has dispatched more field technicians to attend to the fault. The repairs are ongoing. No ETA on completion yet.
Due to extensive damage to the fibre cable FrogFoot technicians are still busy with repairs. Repairs continued through the night and is about 60% done.

closed.title: ClearAccess Outage | Northern Region
closed.description: ClearAccess has informed us of a network outage affecting the entire northern region, affected clients will experience no connectivity. ClearAccess engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: ClearAccess engineers are still actively working on resolving the ongoing connectivity issues. No ETA has been provided yet.

closed.title: Afrihost Outage | KwaZulu Natal
closed.description: We are investigating reports of no connectivity affecting some clients in KwaZulu Natal. Afrihost engineers are working on the issue. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

updates.content: The impact has been mitigated and we are monitoring the network for stability. We apologise for the issues experienced.
Additional impact has been detected. Afrihost network engineers are troubleshooting the root cause of the intermittent connection. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
Services have been restored, and we are currently monitoring.
Services have been restored, and we are currently monitoring.
Afrihost network engineers are actively troubleshooting the root cause of the intermittent to no connectivity issues in KwaZulu Natal. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.

closed.resolution: Please note that the fibre services in Carlswald AH, Lyncon Road, Carlswald have been restored.
